_header: The smaller peasen the more to pot
Subjects: women; adultery; body, parts of; comic verse; erotic verse
_description: Fairness of a woman corresponds to her flightiness, translating a Latin distich, ‘Quo minor est pisa tanto plures capitolla / Quo mage formosa mulier mage luxuriosa’ — one couplet

BodDou52.Transcription:
The smaller pesun the more to pottThe fayrer woman the more
                    gylott
BodDou52.Note: Followed by a Latin distich on the same subject.
